trans-unit.source: Provides a type converter to convert <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.BuiltInRole"></xref> enumeration values to <xref href="System.Security.Principal.WindowsBuiltInRole"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 提供要转换的类型转换器<xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.BuiltInRole"></xref>枚举值来<xref href="System.Security.Principal.WindowsBuiltInRole"></xref>枚举值。

trans-unit.source: This type converter supports the Visual Basic <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.User> object.
trans-unit.target: 此类型转换器支持 Visual Basic<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.User>对象。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.User>

trans-unit.source: For more information about type converters, see the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关类型转换器的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>基类和[如何︰ 实现类型转换器](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > You should never create an instance of a BuiltInRoleConverter class.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!CAUTION]&1;> 决不要创建 BuiltInRoleConverter 类的实例。

trans-unit.source: Instead, call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetConverter%2A> method of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> class.
trans-unit.target: 而应调用<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetConverter%2A>方法的<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>类。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetConverter%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the examples in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> base class.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>基的类</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>中的示例

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.BuiltInRoleConverter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.BuiltInRoleConverter"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: This type converter supports the Visual Basic <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.User> object.
trans-unit.target: 此类型转换器支持 Visual Basic<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.User>对象。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.User>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this converter can convert an object to the given destination type using the context.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示此转换器是否可以将对象转换为使用上下文的指定的目标类型。

trans-unit.source: The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from.
trans-unit.target: `context`参数可用于提取有关从中调用该转换器的环境的附加信息。

trans-unit.source: This can be `Nothing`, so always check.
trans-unit.target: 这可以是`Nothing`，因此总是需要检查。

trans-unit.source: Also, properties on the context object can return `Nothing`.
trans-unit.target: 同样，上下文对象上的属性可以返回`Nothing`。

trans-unit.source: This type converter supports the Visual Basic <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.User> object.
trans-unit.target: 此类型转换器支持 Visual Basic<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.User>对象。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.User>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> object that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref>提供格式上下文的对象。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> object that represents the type you wish to convert to.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Type>表示你想要将转换为的类型的对象。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Boolean> object that indicates whether this converter can perform the conversion.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Boolean>对象，指示此转换器是否能够执行转换。</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Converts the given object to another type.
trans-unit.target: 将给定的对象转换为另一种类型。

trans-unit.source: The most common types to convert to and convert from are string objects.
trans-unit.target: 要转换并转换来自的最常见类型是字符串对象。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation makes a call to <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A> on the object if the object is valid and if the destination type is <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 默认实现将调用<xref:System.Object.ToString%2A>对象上的对象是否有效且目标类型为<xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Object.ToString%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from.
trans-unit.target: `context`参数可用于提取有关从中调用该转换器的环境的附加信息。

trans-unit.source: This can be `Nothing`, so always check.
trans-unit.target: 这可以是`Nothing`，因此总是需要检查。

trans-unit.source: Also, properties on the context object can return `Nothing`.
trans-unit.target: 同样，上下文对象上的属性可以返回`Nothing`。

trans-unit.source: This type converter supports the Visual Basic <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.User> object.
trans-unit.target: 此类型转换器支持 Visual Basic<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.User>对象。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.User>

trans-unit.source: A formatter context.
trans-unit.target: 格式化程序上下文。

trans-unit.source: The culture into which `value` will be converted.
trans-unit.target: 到的区域性`value`将被转换。

trans-unit.source: The object to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要转换的对象。

trans-unit.source: The type to convert the object to.
trans-unit.target: 要转换到的对象的类型。

trans-unit.source: The converted object.
trans-unit.target: 被转换的对象。

trans-unit.source: destinationType is .
trans-unit.target: destinationTypeis .

trans-unit.source: The conversion cannot be performed.
trans-unit.target: 无法执行转换。
